title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4407.7 - Shortages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4407.7 - Shortages

State Regulations
A corporation may deduct from the wages of a branch unit
employee monies owed as a result of such employee's going short on any
particular racing day. The term short as used in this section means any loss to
the corporation arising from amounts missing from funds in the possession, custody or control or under the supervision of any branch unit employee or
employees in the course of the performance of his, her or their duties in
betting operations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4407.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
